content: Like Kevin from The Office said, ‘I’m a textbook over-thinker’. The NFL, and specially those areas involved in talent evaluation, is filled with such people, those who rationally allot a significant amount of importance to such small things. That’s why teams passed on Tom Brady, on Steve Smith Sr, on Kurt Warner, on Russell Wilson, and so, so many others. Less is more. If you can play, you can play.
